text:
on management of
obstetrical complications by the end of the year.
Evaluation points include:
• number of midwives trained;
• whether the trained midwives are now able to
manage obstetrical complications;
• number, causes, and proportion of maternal
deaths before and after training; and
• number of women with obstetrical
complications managed by the trained midwife, and
the outcome of management.
Identify appropriate indicators
Indicators are parameters that have to be measured during
evaluatio
